nodes.text: The Imperial Army Special Missions troopers were deadly special forces troopers under the Galactic Empire's Special Forces Command of the Imperial Army that were deployed to handle high-risk black-ops missions. Among the highly trained personnel that make up the Imperial Army Special Missions troopers were sniper teams, infiltrators, saboteurs, commandos, assassins, and slicers. They operated in the dark and behind enemy lines, and were fully aware that they were disposable and unimportant assets.
